button.name: EmeraldHelp_TeleportLogin
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Rotate Camera behind avatar after Double-click Teleports
check_box.name: move_camaftertp_toggle

spinner.label: Double-click Teleport Z Offset
spinner.name: Double-click Teleport Z Offset
spinner.tool_tip: Controls the Z Offset for Double-click Teleports

check_box.label: Additionally offset up by half the avatar height
check_box.name: avcalc_toggle

radio_group.name: EmeraldDoubleClickTeleportMode

radio_item.tool_tip: This makes the avatar rotation stay the same between doubleclick teleports.

radio_group.radio_item: Keep avatar rotation the same when doubleclick teleporting

radio_item.tool_tip: This makes the avatar use the camera's left/right rotation on doubleclick teleport.

radio_group.radio_item: Rotate avatar according to camera left/right rotation on doubleclick teleport

check_box.label: Color name Tags based on client
check_box.name: ColorTags_toggle

spinner.label: Login Precaching Delay
spinner.name: Login Precaching Delay
spinner.tool_tip: Controls the time on login it waits to let you in

panel.name: Voice

button.name: EmeraldHelp_Voice
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.text: 'Main grid' voice server

line_editor.name: production_voice_field
line_editor.tool_tip: This is the production grid voice channel

panel.text: 'Debug grid' voice server

line_editor.name: debug_voice_field
line_editor.tool_tip: This is the 'debug grid' voice channel

button.name: EmeraldHelp_Shields
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.name: antispam_options

spinner.label: Count
spinner.name: Count
spinner.tool_tip: Controls the number of spam items per time to set off the trigger

spinner.label: Time
spinner.name: Time
spinner.tool_tip: Controls the amount of time you want between count refreshing.

panel.text: To clear the blacklist, turn the protection off then back on. Count and Time are ADVANCED settings. Please use them ONLY if you know what you are doing. Recommended Settings are: Time: 1 Count: 4

panel.name: revokeperm_panel
panel.text: Revoke Permissions

radio_item.tool_tip: Will revoke permissions when you sit on an object.
Will revoke permissions when you stand from an object.
Will revoke permissions when you either stand or sit on an object.

check_box.label: Broadcast camera focus point and pointer target
check_box.name: EmBroadcastPointers-toggle

panel.label: IM
panel.name: Misc

button.name: EmeraldHelp_IM
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

radio_group.name: EmeraldUseOTR

radio_item.tool_tip: Require use of OTR in IMs

radio_group.radio_item: Require use of OTR in IMs

check_box.label: Autorespond to people you have muted
check_box.name: EmeraldInstantMessageResponseMuted

check_box.label: Don't show instant messages from people you've chosen to send auto-responses
check_box.name: EmeraldInstantMessageShowResponded

check_box.label: Send as soon as they start typing
check_box.name: EmeraldInstantMessageShowOnTyping

check_box.label: Autorespond on every message, not just first one they send
check_box.name: EmeraldInstantMessageResponseRepeat

panel.text: Response Text: (Use #f for recipient's first name, #l for last name, #t for timestamp):

check_box.label: Send a item along with the response
check_box.name: EmeraldInstantMessageResponseItem

panel.text: Drop a inventory item here to have it given along with the auto-response.
Currently set to: ITEM

check_box.label: Show money changes in local chat
check_box.name: EmMoneyChat-toggle

button.name: EmeraldHelp_Misc
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

check_box.label: Enable Ctrl-Alt-P to become visually phantom
check_box.name: allowphantomtoggle

check_box.label: Enable Ctrl-Alt-S to ground sit anywhere
check_box.name: allowsittoggle

check_box.label: Display on avatars entering / exiting simulator
check_box.name: radar_chat_sim_toggle

check_box.label: Display on avatars entering / exiting draw distance
check_box.name: radar_chat_draw_toggle

check_box.label: Display on avatars entering / exiting chat range
check_box.name: radar_chat_chatrange_toggle

spinner.label: Agent Updates per second:
spinner.name: EmAgentUpdatesValue
spinner.tool_tip: Allows you to manually adjust the amount of updates you send per second. DEFAULT 10/s

check_box.label: Enable wearing of objects in inventory via double-click
check_box.name: wear-inv-toggle

check_box.label: Block sitting on objects via left-click
check_box.name: sit-click-toggle

check_box.label: Show agent name for LookAt beacons
check_box.name: EmShowLookAtNames-toggle

check_box.label: Hear typing sound when people type
check_box.name: typing-sound-toggle

check_box.label: Allow ESC key to reset camera position in Camera Mode (Ctrl-1)
check_box.name: EmResetCamOnEscape-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Setting this value to False prevents the camera from resetting when escape is pressed from within Camera mode (Ctrl+1).

check_box.label: Allow MU* poses
check_box.name: AllowMUpose-toggle
check_box.tool_tip: Allow MU* pose style in chat and IM (with ':' as a synonymous to '/me ')

panel.label: CmdLine
panel.name: CmdLine

button.name: EmeraldHelp_CmdLine
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.text: ("cmd" in the usage and examples refers to the text in the textbox) Leave any command blank to deactivate it.

check_box.label: Enable usage of chat bar as a command line
check_box.name: chat_cmd_toggle

panel.text: Teleport to a position within the region (usage: cmd x y z) (ex: cmd 128 192 50)
Teleport to terrain ground level (usage: cmd) (ex: cmd)
Teleport to a particular height (usage: cmd z) (ex: cmd 100)
Teleport home (usage: cmd) (ex: cmd)
Rez a platform (diam. optional, 0-30m) (usage: cmd diameter) (ex: cmd 25)

slider.name: EmeraldPlatformSize
slider.label: Width
slider.tool_tip: How big do you want the platform to appear to be?

panel.text: Teleport to a region by name (usage: cmd simname) (ex: cmd Ahern)
Calculate expressions (usage: cmd expressions) (ex:cmd SIN(2+2))
Change Draw Distance (usage: cmd meters) (ex:cmd 256)
Teleport to your camera position (usage: cmd) (ex:cmd)
Retrieve the avatar name from a key (usage: cmd key) (ex:cmd avatar-key)
Offer a teleport to your location (usage: cmd key) (ex:cmd avatar-key)
Teleport to an avatar (usage: cmd name) (ex:cmd First Last)

line_editor.tool_tip: The syntax of this command allows partial names and is not case sensitive. Better results if used while the Radar is open.
line_editor.name: EmeraldCmdLineTP2

panel.label: Avatar
panel.name: wat!

button.name: EmeraldHelp_Avatar
button.tool_tip: Click here for help regarding the settings in this page.

panel.text: Use this to manipulate, to a degree, your avatar bounding box. This can be used to distort orbiters, or to raise you up or down without altering your shape.
Selection beam particle effects

slider.name: EmeraldMaxBeamsPerSecond
slider.label: Beam updates/sec:
slider.tool_tip: How many beam updates to send in a second. Default 40

check_box.label: Enable transmission of selection beam end position
check_box.name: lol-toggle!

check_box.label: Enable selection beam (turning off will hide the beam)
check_box.name: SLPartBeam

combo_box.name: EmeraldBeamShape_combo
combo_box.tool_tip: Select the shape for the particle beam

slider.name: EmeraldBeamShapeScale
slider.label: Scale:
slider.tool_tip: Change the scale of the shape used for the Emerald Shaped Beam

Settings
Texture

combo_box.name: combobox shininess
combo_box.tool_tip: Set the amount of shine for the object

check_box.name: EmeraldBuildPrefs_EmbedItem

panel.text: Drop a inventory item here to have it added to the prim contents.
Currently set to: ITEM
Pivot Point

check_box.label: Values are percent
check_box.tool_tip: Default settings are Percentages and every axis set at 50
check_box.name: EmPivotPercToggle

check_box.label: Enable the highlighting of selected prims
check_box.name: EmBuildPrefsRenderHighlight_toggle

check_box.label: Show axis arrow on root prim position
check_box.tool_tip: Default behaviour is to show the axis on the center of mass of a linkset. If enabled, the axis will be shown on the root prim of the linkset instead.
check_box.name: EmBuildPrefsActualRoot_toggle
